title: Blanchett applauds courage of ‘60 Minutes’ producer
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Entertainment - Today 
NEW YORK — CBS News pro­ducer Mary Mapes had just hit a career peak by exposing the Abu Ghraib prison scandal, when in September 2004 she...
